text: Robert Valge (born 20 April 1997) is an Estonian professional basketball player who plays for Pärnu of the Estonian League. He is a 1.92 m (6 ft 4 in) tall shooting guard.basketball.realgm.com Retrieved 14 September 2018. ==Professional career== Valge began playing basketball with Pärnu in the Estonian League. He moved to Spain in 2016 and played one season for Palencia of the LEB Oro league and their Liga EBA affiliate team Baloncesto Venta de Baños. In 2017 Valge signed with Liga ACB team San Pablo Burgos, but played mostly for their Liga EBA affiliate team Grupo de Automoción Santiago.sport.err.ee Robert Valge oli Burgose napis kaotusmängus suurim skooritegija (in Estonian) 8 April 2018. Retrieved 14 September 2018. In 2017 he spent a three-month loan spell in LEB Plata team Plasencia Extremadura.basket.ee Retrieved 14 September 2018.sport.delfi.ee Kas Robert Valge pääseb Hispaania kõrgliiga klubi pingiotsale? (in Estonian) 30 December 2017.
